When bells peal, they ring with a loud sound: After their wedding, the bells pealed out from the tower.

a long loud sound or series of sounds, especially of laughter or thunder: Her suggestion was met with peals of laughter. A loud peal of thunder woke him from restless sleep.
a long loud ring: When we heard the peal of (the) bells, we knew a truce had been declared.
